    • Method Detail

      • generateAnswerFiles

        public abstract void generateAnswerFiles​(String resource,
                                         emissary.place.IServiceProviderPlace place,
                                         emissary.core.IBaseDataObject initialIbdo,
                                         IBaseDataObjectXmlCodecs.ElementEncoders encoders,
                                         AtomicReference<Class<?>> answerFileClassRef,
                                         String logbackLoggerName)
        Actually generate the answer file for a given resource

        Takes initial form and final forms from the filename

        Parameters:
        resource - to generate against
        place - the place under test
        initialIbdo - for 'setup' section
        encoders - for encoding ibdo into XML
        answerFileClassRef - answer file class (if different from data class)
        logbackLoggerName - name of logger to use

      • getAnswerDocumentFor

        @Nullable
public abstract org.jdom2.Document getAnswerDocumentFor​(String resource,
                                                        AtomicReference<Class<?>> answerFileClassRef)

      • tweakInitialIbdoBeforeSerialization

        protected abstract void tweakInitialIbdoBeforeSerialization​(String resource,
                                                            emissary.core.IBaseDataObject initialIbdo)
        Allow the initial IBDO to be overridden before serializing to XML.

        In the default case, we null out the data in the BDO which will force the data to be loaded from the .dat file instead.

        Parameters:
        resource - path to the dat file
        initialIbdo - to tweak

      • tweakFinalIbdoBeforeSerialization

        protected abstract void tweakFinalIbdoBeforeSerialization​(String resource,
                                                          emissary.core.IBaseDataObject finalIbdo)
        Allow the generated IBDO to be overridden - for example, adding certain field values. Will modify the provided IBDO.

        This is used in the simple case to set the current form for the final object to be taken from the file name. If the test worked correctly no change will be made, but if there is a discrepancy this will be highlighted afterwards when the diff takes place.

        Parameters:
        resource - path to the dat file
        finalIbdo - the existing final BDO after it's been processed by a place

      • tweakFinalResultsBeforeSerialization

        protected void tweakFinalResultsBeforeSerialization​(String resource,
                                                    List<emissary.core.IBaseDataObject> children)
        Allow the children generated by the place to be overridden before serializing to XML.

        In the default case, do nothing.

        Parameters:
        resource - path to the dat file
        children - to tweak

      • tweakFinalLogEventsBeforeSerialization

        protected void tweakFinalLogEventsBeforeSerialization​(String resource,
                                                      List<LogbackTester.SimplifiedLogEvent> simplifiedLogEvents)
        Allows the log events generated by the place to be modified before serializing to XML.

        In the default case, do nothing.

        Parameters:
        resource - path to the dat file
        simplifiedLogEvents - to tweak

      • getTestResx

        public static Path getTestResx()
        Dynamically finds the src/test/resources directory to write the XML to.

        Running locally in an IDE, PROJECT_BASE will likely point to src/main/ Running in Maven/Docker it will most likely point to target/

        Returns:
        a path to write XML output to

      • writeAnswerXml

        public static void writeAnswerXml​(String resource,
                                  emissary.core.IBaseDataObject initialIbdo,
                                  emissary.core.IBaseDataObject finalIbdo,
                                  List<emissary.core.IBaseDataObject> results,
                                  List<LogbackTester.SimplifiedLogEvent> logEvents,
                                  IBaseDataObjectXmlCodecs.ElementEncoders encoders,
                                  @Nullable
                                  AtomicReference<Class<?>> answerFileClassRef)
        Generate the relevant XML and write to disk.
        Parameters:
        resource - referencing the DAT file
        initialIbdo - for 'setup' section
        finalIbdo - for 'answers' section
        results - for 'answers' section
        logEvents - events to send to the LogbackTester
        encoders - for encoding ibdo into XML
        answerFileClassRef - answer file class (if different from data class)

public static byte[] bytesFromDocument​(org.jdom2.Document jdom)

                            byte[] xmlContent,
                            @Nullable
                            AtomicReference<Class<?>> answerFileClassRef)
        Helper method to write XML for a given DAT file.
        Parameters:
        resource - referencing the DAT file
        xmlContent - to write to the XML answer file
        answerFileClassRef - answer file class (if different from data class)

      • getXmlPath

        @Nullable
public static Path getXmlPath​(String resource,
                              @Nullable
                              AtomicReference<Class<?>> answerFileClassRef)
        Gets the XML filename/path for the given resource (a .dat file)
        Parameters:
        resource - path to the .dat file
        answerFileClassRef - answer file class (if different from data class)
        Returns:
        path to the corresponding .xml file

      • fixDisposeRunnables

        public static void fixDisposeRunnables​(emissary.core.IBaseDataObject ibdo)
        Default behavior to fix dispose runnables to change "variant" to "invariant"
        Parameters:
        ibdo - the base data object containing dispose runnables
